feed.title: Assignment Helper Bot
feed.subtitle: We are a few bright students who are looking to help struggling students with their assignments and homeworks and possibly tutor them as well. If you need help just text on our whatsapp number. Computer Science, IT related any assignment can be done here. And the cost will depend on the type of task and negotiation. (+60189717552) Scroll down for seeing our projects.

entry.title: Our Projects!
entry.content:
We have done a lot of different coding projects. Here are links to a few:

  • Machine Learning : Link-Here for the project.

  • Display Board : Link-Here for the project. This is also my first ever project.

  • Java-GUI-Paint : Link-here For this project.

  • Random-Color-Generator : Link-here for this simple app written with Javascript that generates colors.
entry.summary: We have done a lot of different coding projects. Here are links to a few:
